resources.string: Bridge circuit with a first order system
Bridge circuit with a second order system
Download the firmware for arduino UNO from:\n\nhttps://github.com/skgadi/ControlToolbox/tree/master/Arduino/ControlToolBox

string-array.name: SCREENS_LIST
string-array.item: Adaptive Controller for a first order system
Adaptive Controller for a second order system
Identification of a first order system
Identification of a second order system
System identification of first order with integral controller

string-array.name: SETTINGS_WINDOW
string-array.item: Simulation settings>>Sampling time in milli seconds
Graph settings>>Number of retained samples (Larger values may slowdown your device)
Default window zoom on the horizontal axis

string-array.name: TOASTS
string-array.item: Hit the Back button again to exit
Device is not pluged to the phone
Couldn\'t able to establish a connection. Try again with proper permissions.
Unable to open the port. Detach, re-attach the device to fix the problem.
Unknown error. Detach, re-attach the device to fix the problem.
Your android device is not having OTG enabled.
Simulation not available: No model is available in this window simulate or the bridge is not connected.
You cannot exit to the Main menu while the simulation is running. Stop the simulation before proceeding to the main menu.
You cannot invoke this feature while simulation is in progress.
This is not a valid integer number. Enter a number in the range
Please press any of the buttons to exit this window.
Simulation is stopped due to error in communication with the bridge device.

resources.string: Sampling time is the time interval between two consecutive samples
Simulation stops if your device is incapable of operating in this range.
Retains a sample size to display in the graph. Pinch-zoom can be used to change viewing size.
Vertical axis length can be modified here. Pinch-zoom can be used to elongate horizontal axis
Thickness of the lines in the graphs.
Approximates the curve to avoid sharp edges. It is not recommended.
Font size of the axis and legend
